
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define sz(q) (int(q.size()))
#define m make_pair 
#define pb push_back 
#define eb emplace_back 
#define fi first
#define se second

typedef int64_t LL;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;
typedef pair<LL, LL> PLL;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        LL cst[26] = {0};
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        int p, q;
        cin >> p >> q;
        for (int i = 0; i < sz(s); ++i) cst[s[i] - 'a']++;
        for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i) cst[i] *= p;
        while (q--) {
            int n;
            cin >> n;
            bool ok = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i) {
                if (n <= cst[i]) {
                    cout << char('a' + i) << "\n";
                    ok = 1;
                    break;
                } else n -= cst[i];
            }
            if (!ok) cout << "-1\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
